title: Email Spoof

profile.name: Paragon Initiative Enterprises
profile.about: Cryptography and Application Security Consultants - We Produce Various Open Source Libraries

vulnerability_information:
http://emkei.cz/-----> spoofing tool

I tried to send email from security@paragonie.com and scott@paragonie.com, it was successfully sent to the email shivakumarmca12@gmail.com

This can be dangerous because an attacker can send emails with malicious links to gather users personal data ….

Please fix it..
vulnerability_information_html:
http://emkei.cz/-----%3E spoofing tool

I tried to send email from security@paragonie.com and scott@paragonie.com, it was successfully sent to the email shivakumarmca12@gmail.com

This can be dangerous because an attacker can send emails with malicious links to gather users personal data ….

Please fix it..

activities.message: If you have found a remote code execution, private key leak, or XSS flaw in our website, please do report it. Otherwise, please focus on our [open source libraries on Github instead](https://github.com/paragonie).
activities.markdown_message: If you have found a remote code execution, private key leak, or XSS flaw in our website, please do report it. Otherwise, please focus on our open source libraries on Github instead.

activities.message: I did not accept this disclosure..
you marked these type of bug as duplicate to other people  and u marked mine as spam..
activities.markdown_message: you marked these type of bug as duplicate to other people and u marked mine as spam..

activities.message:
No, and you had two months to provide a very good reason to not disclose it publicly. Since that was not provided to me, I went ahead and disclosed it.

Full disclosure is good for security. More vendors should practice it.

activities.message:
I think it comes under Not applicable or duplicate and i am unsure at this time why u closed this as spam.If it is spam you could have marked it as spam to others, but you marked it as a duplicate.so they did not spam you..sending this type of report is really spams you? It spams me , because for each spam report -10 will be decucted and you know how hard i earned those points..You showed partiality to me and i am not interested to disclose it to the public..


Ya, itz vendor wish because a vendor can do anything.They can mark as duplicate or they can say spam and deduct the points..Letz the other hackers and vendors see the partiality...thank you...

activities.message:
I was advised to mark them as spam by an HackerOne employee when I complained about a deluge of the same exact non-issue (SPF headers) being reported. Then yours came in.

If you feel you're being treated unfairly as a result of these circumstances, perhaps there's a way for the H1 staff to retroactively mark the others as spam. Or if they feel appropriate, to re-award you the 10 points. I don't think it's my call either way.

respected scott,

If you would have advised to mark it as spam my report comes  in.Then why the other reports are missed?


Thanks for your help but please don't mark the other people as spam and  please give additional ten points for my next finding , not now..If i find anything...Initially i was  frustrated  but your last reply was very professional..sorry if i talk anything wrong....i will continue to start finding again in your site...bye bro..

activities.message:
I've pinged the H1 Support team to consider reversing the -10. We'll see what they come up with.

Forewarned is forearmed: Our website is still out of scope. The bounty covers our open source project on Github right now.
